    • Constructor Detail

      • PacManSprite

        public PacManSprite(double radius,
                    double posX,
                    double posY,
                    int waitT,
                    java.lang.String direction,
                    int bounces,
                    boolean stopped)
        This function initializes a new PacManSprite.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the PacMan sprite.
        posX - The position on the x axis of the PacMan sprite.
        posY - The position on the y axis of the PacMan sprite.
        waitT - The time that the PacMan sprite has to wait with each movement.
        direction - The direction that the PacMan sprite is currently moving in.
        bounces - The bounces that this sprite has achieved.
        stopped - Tells whether or not this PacMan is stopped.
